newsitem.title: USA: ASV gets financing to expand plant.
newsitem.headline: ASV gets financing to expand plant.

text.p: ASV Inc said Wednesday it received approval for a $1.8 million financing package for its proposed plant expansion.
It said the Iron Range Resource and Rehabilitation Board approved a loan to facilitate a financing package for ASV involving the board and other participating agencies.

The financing will provide loans to ASV for a 60,000-square-foot plant expansion adjacent to its existing 40,000-square-foot manufacturing plant. ASV estimates the plant expansion will provide up to an additional 100 jobs over the next year and a half.

ASV, which designs and manufactures track-driven vehicles and related accessories, said these funds, along with funds from a recently announced $5 million private placement, will it to fund its growth for the next several years.
